title: vinayakayunnadEla sadhaa
sahitya:
vinAyakayunnadEla sadA vinayamugA ninu vEDiyuNDaga 

(vinAyaka)



anupallavi



kanakavallI dEvasEnAnAtha kanikaramutO nannu kAvumi mora

(vinAyaka)



caraNam



amarEndranuta subramaNya nA hrd kamala nivAsa skanda vEgamE

nemilipai rammani entO kOritin-nimiSamu Orvakan nIvE dikkayyA

(vinAyaka)
